titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before Her Majesty, on May 29, being the anniversary of the restauration of the King and royal family by the Bishop of S. Asaph, Lord Almoner to Their Majesties.
titleStmt.author: Lloyd, William, 1627-1717.

notesStmt.note: Half title: The Bishop of St. Asaph's sermon preached before the Queen at Whitehall, May 29.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
